text: Hanna Volodymyrivna Beliba (; April 1, 1970 in Dnipro, Ukraine) is the wife of Acting President Oleksandr Turchynov and a former First Lady of Ukraine. Candidate of SciencesUkrainian Official’s Wife’s Anti-LGBT Remarks Cause Public Outrage. ==Biography== Hanna Volodymyrivna Beliba (birth surname) was born in Dnipro on April 1, 1970. He graduated from the Oles Honchar Dnipro National University. Postgraduate study at Kyiv National Linguistic University. Since 1995 she teaches English at the National Pedagogical Dragomanov University. Since 2006 she is the head of the department of foreign languages, National Pedagogical Dragomanov UniversityUniversity Dean Hanna Turchynova Speaks Out Against Anti-Discrimination Reforms. In 2016, a man who has arrived in Kyiv from occupied territory in Donbas has attempted to stab Hanna Turchynova, the wife of National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine chief Oleksandr Turchynov while she was at workTerrorist from Donbas attacks Turchynov's wife in Kyiv in attempt to stab. The culprit had been waiting for the woman outside her work office. Because the man was relying on a photo from the Internet, on which Hanna Turchynova had a short hair cut, poor lighting led him to attack another teacher with a similar hair cut.
